_description: Section guidance for Record Inspection, keyed by document_role::document_type

what_to_look_for: Verify effective date and term length
Confirm all party names match header
Check for amendment references
Validate territory/rights scope
Verify payment terms and rates
Look for auto-renewal clauses
Confirm termination conditions
common_failure_modes: Mismatched party names between signature block and header
Missing effective date or ambiguous term language
Rate schedules not attached or referenced incorrectly

what_to_look_for: Verify amendment references correct original agreement
Check effective date of rate change
Validate old vs new rate values
Confirm all affected catalog items listed
Verify authorized signatures
common_failure_modes: Amendment references wrong original agreement number
Rate change effective date conflicts with original term
Missing catalog items that should be affected

what_to_look_for: Verify new territories are clearly defined
Check if extension affects existing rate structure
Confirm effective date aligns with original term
Validate that extended territories don't conflict
common_failure_modes: Missing rate terms for new territories

what_to_look_for: Verify all catalog items have valid identifiers
Check for duplicate entries
Validate rate/royalty values are numeric
Confirm territory assignments per item
Look for items with missing metadata
common_failure_modes: Duplicate catalog item entries with different rates
Items assigned to territories not in the agreement

what_to_look_for: Verify document completeness and page count
Confirm all required sections are present
Check for proper execution and dating
Validate party information consistency
Review key commercial terms
Verify record completeness
Check for data consistency across fields
Validate required fields are populated
Look for formatting or encoding issues
Confirm field values match expected formats
